Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Medina
Summary: Relates to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Medina in Orleans county not to exceed two percent of the per diem rental rate for each room; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Medina; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
